name: 國際環境傳播
goals: Enhancing students’ English speaking, listening, reading as well as writing ability
Broadening environmental literacy and global understanding on the environmental issues
Constructing students’ confidence on using English as media for communication in future careers
syllabus:
Every week, we will select a scientific report or relevant environmental news as our weekly reading(s). In class, we will discuss those assigned reading(s), meanwhile, the teacher will provide further resources such as visual material or e-media (e.g. bbc, cnn, United Nation news, Reuters) to enhance other forms of English training and interpretation. We will also invite specialists working in international media, enterprises, or NGOs to give us talks or visit their working places.

  
[教學進度與主題附件](https://ap.itc.ntnu.edu.tw/NtnuFileShare/file.do?action=dl&gno=b66a33ff1a4c4e678e1a1bbf967e96d9&fno=ab92a637197d4ef0aa6d6cb2866809a9)

methodologies.note: Every student will discuss the weekly readings in the class
Students will form groups for project discussion
Teacher will use visual materials or e-media in class
Students will be organized into groups working on a certain topic of environmental issues as term project

grading.note: Every student has to actively participate in the class discussion
Students need to participate in every class
Oral presentation of the term project
Students will be organized into groups working on a certain topic of environmental issues and making a video to communicate their ideas as term project

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
